item.description:
To celebrate our 22nd anniversary, our vice-president, Rev. Douglas Peary, will present a short autobiography and a statement of his beliefs. These will appear in print in the sequel to Doug's "Humanist Heroes."

We'll start with a pot-luck dinner at 7:30 p.m. Please bring something to share. The main talk will follow brief announcements at 8:00 PM.

For more information about this event and others, please read the write-up on our home page.
item.how_to_find_us: We will most probably be in the Social Hall near the main entrance.
item.name: Anniversary Meeting: Doug Peary - My Life and Beliefs
